:columns.type: { [key: string]: any; key: string; sortable?: boolean; direction?: "asc" | "desc"; class?: string; }[]

slots.name: <column>-data
slots.description: Use the #<column>-data slot to customize the data cell of a column. You will have access to the row, column and getRowData properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: Use the #<column>-data slot to customize the data cell of a column. You will have access to the row, column and getRowData properties in the slot scope.

slots.name: <column>-header
slots.description: Use the #<column>-header slot to customize the header cell of a column. You will have access to the column, sort and on-sort properties in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: Use the #<column>-header slot to customize the header cell of a column. You will have access to the column, sort and on-sort properties in the slot scope.

slots.name: loading-state
slots.description: Use the #loading-state slot to customize the loading state.
slots.description_zh: Use the #loading-state slot to customize the loading state.

slots.name: empty-state
slots.description: Use the #empty-state slot to customize the empty state.
slots.description_zh: Use the #empty-state slot to customize the empty state.
